message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
Meet me halfway, let's be equal!
I'll give you 5500, I'll take 4500. Let's meet in the middle, but with a slight edge for me!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I still think I deserve a slight edge!
You gave me a slightly smaller share last time, now it's my turn to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is fair.
You're trying to get me back for the slight edge I gave you last time? I'm not afraid to negotiate, but I think I can do better than this. Bring on the next offer!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle, but with a slight edge for me!
